headline: Florida Power & Light Company named national ReliabilityOne速 award winner for reliability and value
summary: Florida Power & Light Company (FPL) received the 2025 ReliabilityOne速 National Reliability Award from PA Consulting for delivering outstanding service reliability to more than 6 million customer accounts across Florida. PA Consulting also honored FPL with its national Reliability Value Award for keeping customer bills as low as possible while prioritizing strategic investments in the electric grid to meet current and future energy needs.
